title: Incredible Arcade Sona fan art

embed.description: Patreon | Tumblr | Facebook I want to start doing some more League art, starting with this! I'm really glad I decided to do something so colourful; Daughter of the...

body:
I absolutely love this style, and its by an Aussie!

You can support the artist by either becoming a [patron](https://www.patreon.com/lushiesart?ty=h)
Or you can order a print of this piece! [Link](http://fineartamerica.com/featured/arcade-sona-alycia-whatley.html) 

I think she deserves all the support she can get :)


{{champion:37}}

replies.body: Really cool artwork, and the small shot of the picture next to this thread on the boards makes it better lol
I know right, that click bait.
Haha, riot did a splendid job there apparently!
